description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Oh Noes!!1 a giant chicken with laser eyes is stomping down upon helpless humanity. Who will save them... certainly not you, you control the chicken. Play this Ultra-Realistic-Laser-Eyed-Chicken Simulation now and stomp down upon humanity like it so richly deserves. Please not this game is EXCESSIVELY VIOLENT and EXCESSIVELY GORY... Oh Wellz...
